content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the court section of locri on january 22 2022 the text does not provide any further information about the parties involved or the details of the case the case involves compensation and the progress of the cause is discussed over a threeyear period from 2019 to 2022 the court of locri has made a final ruling on the dissolution of a community inheritance ordering the division of the property and specifying which parts belong to each party one party is also ordered to pay a sum of money to another party as an adjustment all parties are required to pay the costs of the proceedings including the cost of an experts report the plaintiff requested the division of a property complex and the allocation of shares to the coowners while the defendants opposed the division but proposed a conciliatory solution the courtappointed expert assessed the property and proposed divisional projects with one project being approved by the court the court also ordered the defendants to pay a balance to the plaintiff the costs of the proceedings including the experts report are to be borne by the parties
